# Down Home Disposal

> Residential trash pickup service serving Middle Tennessee

## About
Down Home Disposal provides reliable weekly curbside trash collection for residential customers in Franklin, Thompson's Station, Spring Hill, Columbia, and Pulaski, Tennessee. Service includes a 96-gallon rolling cart for $27/month.

## Services
- Weekly residential trash pickup
- 96-gallon rolling cart provided
- Curbside collection

## Service Areas
- Franklin, TN (Tuesdays)
- Thompson's Station, TN (Tuesdays)
- Spring Hill, TN (Wednesdays)
- Columbia, TN (Thursdays)
- Pulaski, TN (Fridays)

## Contact
- Phone: (931) 309-2245
- Email: DHJunkRemovalandDemolition@gmail.com
- Address: 2027 Kimberly Dr, Mt Juliet, TN 37122
